row.title: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”
row.author: Albert Einstein

row.title: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”
row.author: J.K. Rowling

row.title: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”
row.author: Albert Einstein

row.title: “The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.”
row.author: Jane Austen

row.title: “Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.”
row.author: Marilyn Monroe

row.title: “Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.”
row.author: Albert Einstein

row.title: “It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.”
row.author: André Gide

row.title: “I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.”
row.author: Thomas A. Edison

row.title: “A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.”
row.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

row.title: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”
row.author: Steve Martin
